quote: People perceive you at the level of your communication, not at the level of your capability.
why_clipworthy: This statement challenges listeners to prioritize communication skills over technical skills.
suggested_hook: Are you being underestimated because of how you communicate?

quote: We all want to refer each other. It's just how do we do it professionally?
why_clipworthy: Reveals a natural human tendency that can be leveraged for business growth.
suggested_hook: Unlock the secret to getting more referrals effortlessly.
